name: Equellum/Fabula: Carmen Cygni
description: Equellum/Fabula: Carmen Cygni follows Roz-chan, our protagonist horsegirl, on her new life in the town of Umikaze. Upon her first few days there, the town's castle, Vigil Castle, suddenly transforms into a tower at night! What could be the cause of this? What mysteries lie inside the castle at night? How many doughnuts will Roz-chan eat? Find this out and much more in Equellum/Fabula: Carmen Cygni!
